speaker: Patient
text: So, with the losartan, I haven't had any of that cough, which is a relief. But, um, should I be worried about any other side effects that might pop up?

speaker: Clinician
text: That's good to hear about the cough. Losartan is generally well-tolerated, but some people might experience dizziness or, uh, a bit of fatigue. Have you noticed anything like that?

speaker: Patient
text: Not really, just a bit tired sometimes, but I thought that was just, you know, getting older.

speaker: Clinician
text: It could be, but if it becomes more noticeable or bothersome, let me know. We can always adjust things if needed.

speaker: Patient
text: Okay, I will. And, um, with the atorvastatin, I read somewhere that it can cause muscle pain. Should I be on the lookout for that?

speaker: Clinician
text: Yes, muscle pain can happen, but it's not very common. If you do start feeling any unusual aches, especially in your legs, just give me a call.
